title: Heart research
brief_description: David Crawford has always studied and worked in the field of science. With assistance from the Heart Foundation, it’s his work in public health research that provides the most satisfaction. Created as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’ in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.
